@wp.kernel
def rand_expr_nwkxgl(data: wp.array(dtype=float)):
    tid = wp.tid()
    v0 = data[tid]
    v1 = 0.0
    v2 = 1.0
    tmp = 0.0
    v0 = (0.46 / v2)
    tmp = wp.exp((0.45 * (v1 + 0.40 * v0 + 0.37)))
    tmp = wp.abs((wp.cos(v0 + 0.02) + (v2 + 0.82 - v0 + 0.95)))
    data[tid] = v0
